name: Palette's Bottomless Backpack
description:
Palette’s joining her friends at dinner. But she’s misplaced some things, way at the bottom of her backpack. Oops.

Left click a container to drag an item out. Find some stuff. Enjoy the soundtrack with silver/glassware worked in, fully-voiced simspeak, yourself, and the chaos!

Made for our first-ever Ludum Dare: LD48 (48).

CeltiCoTeam:
The Neat Programming & Sound Effects — Celtican
The Rad Art — Gardenovena
The Groovy Music (partially made using kitchenware) — Marshmallow
